title: Understanding the Cyber Kill Chain: How Cyberattacks Actually Happen
excerpt: A deep dive into the 7 stages of the Cyber Kill Chain — from reconnaissance to actions on objectives — with real-world techniques and defense strategies.

title: Access Denied? Not Really: A Complete Guide to Forbidden Page Bypass Techniques
excerpt: A 403 Forbidden response is not proof of security. From URL tricks to header manipulation, here's how access controls really break down.
